pullRequest.title: Refactoring/simplification
pullRequest.bodyText: The changes in this pull request simplify the overall implementation of the mpOpenAPI feature.

nodes.bodyText:
This is much better.
However, is there a possibility that anything else could be reading openAPIModel at the same point that this modification is happening? (E.g. line 125)
I suspect that you need to synchronize around every access to openAPIModel to be safe here.
